mapper.select: SELECT equipmentno, inputdatetime, sn from lab_mon.monitorequipmentlastdata WHERE toYYYYMM ( inputdatetime ) IN ( #{param.yearMonth} ) AND hospitalcode = #{param.hospitalCode} AND equipmentno = #{param.equipmentNo} AND cmdid ='88' ORDER BY inputdatetime

select formatDateTime(inputdatetime,'%Y-%m-%d') as remark1,count(1) remark2 from lab_mon.monitorequipmentlastdata WHERE hospitalcode = #{param.hospitalCode} and cmdid ='88' and toYYYYMM ( inputdatetime ) IN ( #{param.yearMonth} ) and equipmentno = #{param.equipmentNo} group by remark1 order by remark1
